title: Possibly play with a Rioter for my 1000th win
body:
I was wondering if a Riot employee see's this. if they would play with me for my 1000th. Would be an awesome experience.
Thanks. :)

replies.body:
I'm past 1000. Mindstar I choose you! Or what ever rioter has the time ^_^
Listen to our pleas riot {{champion:32}}
Good luck getting the love of Rito
I am also close to mine. Although I doubt any Rioter would willingly want to play with me haha
